use."},{"lineNumber":153612,"originalJapaneseLine":"ファット形態の彼女は仮に無敵結界がなくとも","translatedEnglishLine":"In Fat form, even without an invincible barrier,"},{"lineNumber":153613,"originalJapaneseLine":"傷一つ負わず大量虐殺せしめる。","translatedEnglishLine":"she inflicts mass slaughter without a single coming...\""},{"lineNumber":153617,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィの両足に力が込められ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Power gathered into Silky's legs,"},{"lineNumber":153618,"originalJapaneseLine":"地面に沈んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"pressing down into the ground."},{"lineNumber":153619,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――来るぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—It's coming!\""},{"lineNumber":153620,"originalJapaneseLine":"巨大な甲冑が弾丸のように飛び出した。","translatedEnglishLine":"A gigantic armor sprang forward like a bullet."},{"lineNumber":153621,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐあっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guh!\""},{"lineNumber":153622,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぎゃっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hyaah!?\""},{"lineNumber":153623,"originalJapaneseLine":"鋼鉄よりも硬い甲冑の塊が、","translatedEnglishLine":"A mass of armor harder than steel,"},{"lineNumber":153624,"originalJapaneseLine":"時速100km以上の速度で突っ込んでくる。","translatedEnglishLine":"rushing forward at over 100 km/h."},{"lineNumber":153625,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィがしていることはただの体当たりだが、","translatedEnglishLine":"What Silky is doing is just a body charge,"},{"lineNumber":153626,"originalJapaneseLine":"甲冑の重量200kgと爆発のような速度により、","translatedEnglishLine":"but with the armor weighing 200 kg and moving at explosive speed,"},{"lineNumber":153627,"originalJapaneseLine":"その威力はまるで大砲の一撃だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"its impact was like a cannon blast."},{"lineNumber":153628,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人であるシルキィが大した労力も使わずとも","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky, being a demon, did not even need to exert much effort,"},{"lineNumber":153629,"originalJapaneseLine":"大量の兵が吹き飛ばされていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"and a large number of soldiers were blown away."},{"lineNumber":153630,"originalJapaneseLine":"「誰かアイツを止めろォ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Someone stop her!\""},{"lineNumber":153631,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だ、駄目だ！　止まらねえ！　ぐああっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no good! She won't stop! Guaaah!\""},{"lineNumber":153632,"originalJapaneseLine":"まるで暴走機関車のように戦場を駆け抜け、","translatedEnglishLine":"She ran through the battlefield like a runaway train,"},{"lineNumber":153633,"originalJapaneseLine":"その最中にいる者は全て血煙に沈ませる。","translatedEnglishLine":"turning everyone in her path into a cloud of blood."},{"lineNumber":153634,"originalJapaneseLine":"――しかし、それで背を向けるほど、","translatedEnglishLine":"—However, not enough to turn their backs on her,"},{"lineNumber":153635,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザスの兵も弱くはない。","translatedEnglishLine":"the soldiers of Lysus were not weak either."},{"lineNumber":153636,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now!\""},{"lineNumber":153637,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—!?\""},{"lineNumber":153638,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィが足を止めた一瞬の隙を突き、","translatedEnglishLine":"Seizing the brief moment Silky stopped,"},{"lineNumber":153639,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス兵がシルキィの巨体に鉄網をかぶせた。","translatedEnglishLine":"the Lysus soldiers threw an iron net over Silky's huge body."},{"lineNumber":153640,"originalJapaneseLine":"鉄網はすぐさまシルキィの体に絡みつき、","translatedEnglishLine":"The iron net immediately wrapped around Silky's body,"},{"lineNumber":153641,"originalJapaneseLine":"両手のみならず足の動きも止めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"stopping the movement not only of her hands but also her legs."},{"lineNumber":153642,"originalJapaneseLine":"が、しかし――","translatedEnglishLine":"But, however—"},{"lineNumber":153643,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":153644,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜ミリ、ミリミリミリ……＞","translatedEnglishLine":"　　＜Miri, miri miri miri...＞"},{"lineNumber":153645,"originalJapaneseLine":"「て、鉄網を引き千切っている……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"S-she's tearing the iron net apart...\""},{ "lineNumber":153646,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なにをしている！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What are you doing!"},{"lineNumber":153647,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今だ！　例の地点にまで誘導しろ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now! Guide her to that designated point!\""},{"lineNumber":153648,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ、そうだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, that's right!"},{"lineNumber":153649,"originalJapaneseLine":"　押せ！　押せぇぇぇーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Push! Push her---!\""},{"lineNumber":153650,"originalJapaneseLine":"剣を捨てた青の軍の兵士が、","translatedEnglishLine":"A soldier of the blue army who discarded his sword,"},{"lineNumber":153651,"originalJapaneseLine":"肩からシルキィにぶつかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"collided shoulder-first into Silky."},{"lineNumber":153652,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まだまだァーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not yet---!\""},{"lineNumber":153653,"originalJapaneseLine":"その後も何人もの兵が後に続き、","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, many soldiers followed,"},{"lineNumber":153654,"originalJapaneseLine":"自らの肩が砕けるのも構わぬ突撃を繰り出し、","translatedEnglishLine":"launching charges not caring if their shoulders were broken,"},{"lineNumber":153655,"originalJapaneseLine":"十数人がよってたかってシルキィを押す。","translatedEnglishLine":"dozens of them gathered to push Silky."},{"lineNumber":153656,"originalJapaneseLine":"「押ォォォせェェェェーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Puuuuushhhhhh!\""},{"lineNumber":153657,"originalJapaneseLine":"全ての力を振り絞るような突撃に","translatedEnglishLine":"With a charge summoning all their strength,"},{"lineNumber":153658,"originalJapaneseLine":"さすがのシルキィもたたらを踏み、","translatedEnglishLine":"even Silky stumbled,"},{"lineNumber":153659,"originalJapaneseLine":"その背後にあったのは――","translatedEnglishLine":"and behind her was—"},{"lineNumber":153660,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時には剣、時には斧、時には弓、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes a sword, sometimes an axe, sometimes a bow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 果ては鎧にも姿を変える特殊な武器。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ultimately a special weapon that can even transform into armor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『生体強化外部骨格リトル』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Biological Enhanced External Skeleton Little'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが現在彼女が身にまとう物の名である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is the name of what she currently wears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人になった後、彼女の付与能力は更に強力となり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After becoming a demon, her granted abilities became even more powerful,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鉱物だけでなく生物、植物、大気元素も素材とし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: using not only minerals but also living organisms, plants, and atmospheric elements as materials,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に元が分からぬ不思議な物体と化した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it has already become a mysterious object whose origin is unrecognizable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リトルの基本の形態にして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The basic form of Little is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃特化型剣形態『リトル』と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the attack-specialized sword form 'Little' and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 防御特化型鎧形態『ファット』。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the defense-specialized armor form 'Fat'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この二つが魔人シルキィが好んで使う形態である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These two are the forms that the demon Silky prefers to use.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ファット形態の彼女は仮に無敵結界がなくとも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Fat form, even without an invincible barrier,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傷一つ負わず大量虐殺せしめる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she inflicts mass slaughter without a single wound.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その力、まさしく一騎当千であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That power was truly unmatched, capable of defeating a thousand alone.
"I-it's coming..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィの両足に力が込められ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Power gathered into Silky's legs,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地面に沈んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: pressing down into the ground.
"—It's coming!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大な甲冑が弾丸のように飛び出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A gigantic armor sprang forward like a bullet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐあっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぎゃっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hyaah!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鋼鉄よりも硬い甲冑の塊が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A mass of armor harder than steel,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時速100km以上の速度で突っ込んでくる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: rushing forward at over 100 km/h.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィがしていることはただの体当たりだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What Silky is doing is just a body charge,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 甲冑の重量200kgと爆発のような速度により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but with the armor weighing 200 kg and moving at explosive speed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その威力はまるで大砲の一撃だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: its impact was like a cannon blast.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人であるシルキィが大した労力も使わずとも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky, being a demon, did not even need to exert much effort,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大量の兵が吹き飛ばされていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a large number of soldiers were blown away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰かアイツを止めろォ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Someone stop her!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だ、駄目だ！　止まらねえ！　ぐああっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no good! She won't stop! Guaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで暴走機関車のように戦場を駆け抜け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She ran through the battlefield like a runaway train,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その最中にいる者は全て血煙に沈ませる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: turning everyone in her path into a cloud of blood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――しかし、それで背を向けるほど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —However, not enough to turn their backs on her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの兵も弱くはない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the soldiers of Lysus were not weak either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィが足を止めた一瞬の隙を突き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seizing the brief moment Silky stopped,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス兵がシルキィの巨体に鉄網をかぶせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Lysus soldiers threw an iron net over Silky's huge body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鉄網はすぐさまシルキィの体に絡みつき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The iron net immediately wrapped around Silky's body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両手のみならず足の動きも止めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stopping the movement not only of her hands but also her legs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、しかし――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, however—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ミリ、ミリミリミリ……＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ＜Miri, miri miri miri...＞

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「て、鉄網を引き千切っている……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "S-she's tearing the iron net apart..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なにをしている！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What are you doing!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今だ！　例の地点にまで誘導しろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now! Guide her to that designated point!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ、そうだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, that's right!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 押せ！　押せぇぇぇーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Push! Push her---!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣を捨てた青の軍の兵士が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A soldier of the blue army who discarded his sword,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肩からシルキィにぶつかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: collided shoulder-first into Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まだまだァーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not yet---!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後も何人もの兵が後に続き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, many soldiers followed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自らの肩が砕けるのも構わぬ突撃を繰り出し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: launching charges not caring if their shoulders were broken,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 十数人がよってたかってシルキィを押す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: dozens of them gathered to push Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「押ォォォせェェェェーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Puuuuushhhhhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全ての力を振り絞るような突撃に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a charge summoning all their strength,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがのシルキィもたたらを踏み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even Silky stumbled,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その背後にあったのは――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and behind her was—

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時には剣、時には斧、時には弓、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes a sword, sometimes an axe, sometimes a bow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 果ては鎧にも姿を変える特殊な武器。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ultimately a special weapon that can even transform into armor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『生体強化外部骨格リトル』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Biological Enhanced External Skeleton Little'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが現在彼女が身にまとう物の名である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is the name of what she currently wears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人になった後、彼女の付与能力は更に強力となり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After becoming a demon, her granted abilities became even more powerful,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鉱物だけでなく生物、植物、大気元素も素材とし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: using not only minerals but also living organisms, plants, and atmospheric elements as materials,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に元が分からぬ不思議な物体と化した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it has already become a mysterious object whose origin is unrecognizable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リトルの基本の形態にして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The basic form of Little is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃特化型剣形態『リトル』と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the attack-specialized sword form 'Little' and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 防御特化型鎧形態『ファット』。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the defense-specialized armor form 'Fat'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この二つが魔人シルキィが好んで使う形態である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These two are the forms that the demon Silky prefers to use.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ファット形態の彼女は仮に無敵結界がなくとも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Fat form, even without an invincible barrier,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傷一つ負わず大量虐殺せしめる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she inflicts mass slaughter without a single wound.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その力、まさしく一騎当千であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That power was truly unmatched, capable of defeating a thousand alone.
"I-it's coming..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィの両足に力が込められ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Power gathered into Silky's legs,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地面に沈んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: pressing down into the ground.
"—It's coming!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大な甲冑が弾丸のように飛び出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A gigantic armor sprang forward like a bullet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐあっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぎゃっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hyaah!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鋼鉄よりも硬い甲冑の塊が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A mass of armor harder than steel,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時速100km以上の速度で突っ込んでくる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: rushing forward at over 100 km/h.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィがしていることはただの体当たりだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What Silky is doing is just a body charge,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 甲冑の重量200kgと爆発のような速度により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but with the armor weighing 200 kg and moving at explosive speed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その威力はまるで大砲の一撃だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: its impact was like a cannon blast.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人であるシルキィが大した労力も使わずとも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky, being a demon, did not even need to exert much effort,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大量の兵が吹き飛ばされていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a large number of soldiers were blown away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰かアイツを止めろォ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Someone stop her!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だ、駄目だ！　止まらねえ！　ぐああっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no good! She won't stop! Guaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで暴走機関車のように戦場を駆け抜け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She ran through the battlefield like a runaway train,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その最中にいる者は全て血煙に沈ませる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: turning everyone in her path into a cloud of blood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――しかし、それで背を向けるほど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —However, not enough to turn their backs on her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの兵も弱くはない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the soldiers of Lysus were not weak either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィが足を止めた一瞬の隙を突き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seizing the brief moment Silky stopped,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス兵がシルキィの巨体に鉄網をかぶせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Lysus soldiers threw an iron net over Silky's huge body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鉄網はすぐさまシルキィの体に絡みつき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The iron net immediately wrapped around Silky's body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両手のみならず足の動きも止めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stopping the movement not only of her hands but also her legs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、しかし――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, however—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ミリ、ミリミリミリ……＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ＜Miri, miri miri miri...＞

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「て、鉄網を引き千切っている……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "S-she's tearing the iron net apart..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なにをしている！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What are you doing!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今だ！　例の地点にまで誘導しろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now! Guide her to that designated point!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ、そうだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, that's right!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 押せ！　押せぇぇぇーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Push! Push her---!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣を捨てた青の軍の兵士が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A soldier of the blue army who discarded his sword,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肩からシルキィにぶつかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: collided shoulder-first into Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まだまだァーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not yet---!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後も何人もの兵が後に続き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, many soldiers followed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自らの肩が砕けるのも構わぬ突撃を繰り出し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: launching charges not caring if their shoulders were broken,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 十数人がよってたかってシルキィを押す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: dozens of them gathered to push Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「押ォォォせェェェェーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Puuuuushhhhhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全ての力を振り絞るような突撃に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a charge summoning all their strength,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがのシルキィもたたらを踏み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even Silky stumbled,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その背後にあったのは――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and behind her was—
